traits.name: Spider Climb
traits.desc: The carrion claw can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

traits.name: Magical Light Sensitivity
traits.desc: While in magical light, the carrion claw has disadvantage on attack rolls, and opponents have advantage on attack rolls against it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The carrion claw makes one bite attack and three claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature other than undead, it must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be paralyzed for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (3d8 +4) slashing damage.
